data.name: Alabama Bones Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Nostalgia called, and it wants its pixels back!



Alabama Bones is a classic point and click adventure game, without the convoluted inventory system or pixel hunting. The familiar storyline comes with a twist: you embark on a journey to return decades of stolen artifacts from museums to their rightful owners.

Controls

  • Mouse - just point and click to move and interact with objects.
  • Gamepad - move the character close to objets and use the action button to trigger interactions.



The first chapter of the game takes us from the Peruvian high desert roads deep into the jungle where our hero needs to find his way back into that one fateful cave. Unfortunately, the cave won't take its secrets back so easily and there will be plenty of unpleasant traps along the way.

data.short_description: Alabama Bones is a classic point and click adventure, streamlined for the modern age. Explore locations across continents and solve simple puzzles to return a variety of museum artifacts to their original owners.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu/SteamOS 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
